title: For Sale : T206 Piedmont Keeler batting SGC 20  ( Sold )
author: svtPONY95

posts.post_title: For Sale : T206 Piedmont Keeler batting SGC 20  ( Sold )
posts.post_content:
Nice card for the grade and very clean. Has light surface creases on front right of card but does not extend to back of card.The back of the card is very clean with no paper loss. First $90 takes it !  **** Sold ****

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/svtPONY95/pre-war/17990/1909-t206-willie-keeler-piedmont[/IMG]
